alert.note: Alert for Northern Oneida; Southern Oneida (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 21 at 3:16PM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Oneida County through 400 PM EST... At 315 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles north of Bridgeport, or 10 miles southwest of Camden, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Rome, Lee, Vienna, Camden, Sylvan Beach, Delta Lake, Taberg, Blossvale, New London and Stokes Corner. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
